= Horizontal rules =

Horizontal rules are created by adding four or more dashes at the beginning of
the line. No other characters may appear before or after dashes.

== Correct ==

4 dashes:
{{{
----
}}}

----

more than 4 dashes:
{{{
--------------------
}}}

--------------------

== Incorrect ==

trailing space:
{{{
----- (there is a space after last dash)
}}}

----- 

leading space:

{{{
 -----
}}}

 -----

extra characters:

{{{
-----foo
}}}

-----foo

not enough hypens:

{{{
---
}}}

---
